title: The Best Boo Story Goes to....
itunes:title: The Best Boo Story Goes to....
description:
Monday 11/12 - Today on the show we had comedian Yamaneika stop by where she spoke about coming up as a comedian, messing with a white man, and having by far the best boo story ever. Also, we had retired NBA player Sebastian Telfair stopped by and spoke on  on his NBA fallout, court cases, dropping music and more. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Senator Cindy Hyde Smith for joking about going to a 'public hanging' when asked about her opponent a black man Mike Espy. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 11/12 - Today on the show we had comedian Yamaneika stop by where she spoke about coming up as a comedian, messing with a white man, and having by far the best boo story ever. Also, we had retired NBA player Sebastian Telfair stopped by and spoke on  on his NBA fallout, court cases, dropping music and more. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Senator Cindy Hyde Smith for joking about going to a 'public hanging' when asked about her opponent a black man Mike Espy. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
